name: Accesa IT
tag_list: microsoft-expertise, custom-application-development, application-development-expertise, application-development-on--net, agile-software-development, custom-software-development, development-of-custom-software, custom-software-migration, outsource-custom-a
overview:
Accesa offers Microsoft technology consulting services and customized software solutions designed to reach business performance and to solve the challenges brought up by the newest technology trends.The company is specialized in technical advising, conception of tailored business solutions, cross-platform integration and product development.

Our services outline a delivery portfolio that address IT companies, start-ups, large-scale organizations and encompasses architecture and design, development and implementation, project management and process strategy. Founded in 2004, Accesa is a value-based technology consulting company that deliver services from proximal locations and offices in Germany (Munich) and Romania (Cluj-Napoca, Oradea). Our expertise has been recognized by the Microsoft Gold Application Development competency and a nomination in the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Program for the year 2012.

Expertise: product development, system integration & B2B portals, enterprise Intranet Portals, cloud enabled solutions (Azure, Amazon), BI consulting & development of Data Warehouse solutions (using Microsoft BI & QlikView), SharePoint custom solutions, .NET Web-based & desktop applications, mobile applications (Android, iOS, Windows 8). Our competences applies on various industries as: logistics, high-tech equipment manufacturing, aerospace, tourism & hospitality, social apps, SAP automation & integration. Our consultants have a strong international expertise and being able to easily team-up with our partner for projects where is necessary to work in Agile distributed teams.
